title: Ikusa Otome Suvia
synopsis: The King of Hell had held Odin, the ruler of Norse gods, captured in the Land of the Dead with the help of Loki, the Trickster. The Valkyries failed to save him and ended up becoming sex slaves to the demons.
staff: [['Yoshida, Tomohiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Lilith Soft', ['Original Creator']], ['Hifumi', ['Art Director']], ['Ushijima, Yuji', ['Director of Photography', ' Animation Director', ' Character Design']]]
